name: SCHEDULING_GROUPER_INFO
description: This table includes information about your scheduling grouper records. This includes information about record status and override record information.

columns.name: GROUPER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the grouper record.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_CONTEXT
columns.description: Stores the override context for the record

columns.name: PARENT_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: For an override record, this stores the ID of the parent record
